mapper.update: update ware_sku set sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock_name = #{stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_locked = #{stockLocked,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, sku_id, warehouse_id, stock, stock_name, stock_locked from ware_sku
